title: Purpose of executive term limit in Mex. and Nig.

content.question: Describe the executive term limit rule in Mexico. Describe the executive term limit rule in Nigeria. Explain why many countries emerging from authoritarian rule use executive term limits.

frqParts.text: Describe the executive term limit rule in Mexico. Describe the executive term limit rule in Nigeria. Explain why many countries emerging from authoritarian rule use executive term limits.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
